Sentencas: Ce1-xLaxO2-delta (0 <= X <= 0.2) nanoparticles have been synthesized by a sol-gel method and a hydrothermal method, respectively.
Titulo: Synthesis and microstructure of La-doped ceria nanoparticles

Sentencas: Nanoparticles have been obtained and the optimum synthesis parameters and microstructural characteristics have also been studied.
Titulo: Synthesis and microstructure of La-doped ceria nanoparticles

Sentencas: High purity and well-dispersed nanoparticles with a narrow grain size distribution of 10-20 nm have been obtained.
Titulo: Synthesis and microstructure of La-doped ceria nanoparticles

Sentencas: Sol-gel method was much more superior than the hydrothermal method in synthesizing particles in small average crystal size.
Titulo: Synthesis and microstructure of La-doped ceria nanoparticles

Sentencas: The microstructure characteristics showed that there were (111) and (200) planes with the angle of 53.9 +/- 0.8 degrees for Ce0.8La0.2O1.9 and (100) and (101) planes with the angle of 30.85 0.75, for La2O3 in the lattice, respectively.
Titulo: Synthesis and microstructure of La-doped ceria nanoparticles

Sentencas: The formation mechanism of the solid solution has been discussed and the maximum percentage of La2O3 in Ce1-xLaxO2-delta (0 <= x <= 0.2) solid solution was near to 20 percent.
Titulo: Synthesis and microstructure of La-doped ceria nanoparticles
